channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I’m stumped’: I put $3,000 on my credit card during a vacation and my credit score plunged. Why is it so volatile?
item.description: “Doesn’t a 30-year history of good credit count for anything?”

item.title: ‘She may have a spending problem’: Would it be wrong to secretly give our son money — without telling his wife?
item.description: “Our son and his wife, who are in their 30s with a child in preschool, are having marital problems.”

item.title: My father died leaving an old will predating his fourth wife. Who inherits his estate?
item.description: “He gave his fourth wife power of attorney and access to his bank account to pay bills.”

item.title: Friday’s selloff broke something in the stock market. Here’s what that means for investors.
item.description: Longview Economics says investors should tread carefully with stocks as something was broken with Friday’s selloff last week.

item.title: My stepdaughter is buying a house. Can her soon-to-be ex-husband claim a share?
item.description: “Her real-estate agent has assured her that she has nothing to worry about.”

item.title: Trump, JPMorgan bolstering critical U.S. supply chains. These ‘national security’ stocks may benefit, Morgan Stanley says
item.description: Electric vehicle maker Tesla could benefit as the Trump administration redirects investments into core U.S. businesses, according to Morgan Stanley.

item.title: Best Stocks: 5 names on our list showed strength during Friday's sell-off. Where we think they will go from here
item.description: Josh Brown and Sean Russo go through five names on the Best Stocks list that showed resilience while the broader market struggled on Friday.

item.title: The bull market just turned 3 years old – how long do they typically last after making that milestone?
item.description: The S&P 500 has climbed a wall of worry back to all-time highs since bottoming on Oct. 12, 2022. That's a good sign for what comes next.

item.title: BlackRock fund manager says investors can boost income by going global with government bonds
item.description: A U.S.-only portfolio is very correlated with the nation's business cycle, inflation and U.S. Treasury issuance, said BlackRock's Tom Becker.

item.title: The charts on this popular bond ETF are improving as volatility increases, says Katie Stockton
item.description: Katie Stockton goes through the technical backdrop of TLT.
